title: Debating Techniques
brief_description: In this program, the formal rules and techniques of Debating are presented in detail. Middle School students are involved in a debate, providing a real context for the presentation of the techniques. The Debate, its format, the role of each team and of each member of the team, are explained and demonstrated. Adjudication of the Debate is included.
